articles.author: Alex Blake
articles.title: Apple is redesigning the iMac. Here’s what it must get right - Digital Trends
articles.description: With a huge iMac overhaul on the horizon, Apple needs to focus on getting the little things right, too. That means it cannot overlook these two vital elements.
